Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen to make cooking less stressful or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone.  Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting nerds at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top 10 Amazon deals right now, including noise-canceling headphones, one of the best gaming mice we've ever tried and our favorite ice cream maker, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Need gift ideas? We've got you covered there, too. 

► Holiday Gift Guide 2021:  100 amazing gifts for every type of person and budget

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 10 best Amazon deals you can get today

1. Less than $60: Our favorite ice cream maker

Make your favorite sweet scoop regardless of the season with the Cuisinart ICE-21 ice cream maker. Usually listed for as much as $110, you can get the white model for $56.24 with the coupon listed on the product page. This 1.5-quart kitchen piece is our favorite ice cream maker thanks to the way it prepared chilled treats in just 20 minutes—the quickest we tested, as long as you freeze the canister overnight (like most ice cream makers)! We also liked the machine's simple design, featuring an open top that facilitates pouring in chocolate chips and scooping out taste tests.

Get the Cuisinart ICE-21 Ice Cream Maker from $56.24 with coupon (Save $13.71 to $53.76)

2. Up to 39% off: These Tea Forte gifts

Still looking for heartwarming gifts this holiday season? Pick up a Tea Forte product on sale at Amazon today to help your loved ones relax. You can get the Single Steeps Winter Collection tea set for $11.55, 30% off its list price of $16.50. The set includes 15 pouches of tea flavors including Ginger Snap, Belgian Mint, Winter Chai and more. Your giftee can start sipping right away if you also send the Tea Forte Kati Cup tea infuser for $13.93 (also 30% off its regular price tag). The ceramic cup comes with a stainless steel infuser basket and is built with an insulated double wall to keep your brew warmer for longer.

Save up to 39% on Tea Forte products

3. 50% off: One of our favorite gaming mice

If you're jumping into the world of PC gaming and need a quality mouse but don't want to spend a fortune, we recommend the SteelSeries Rival 3. The lightweight device is the wireless version of our favorite affordable gaming mouse, which impressed us with its easy maneuverability and solid build quality. It also has programmable buttons and customizable lighting accessible via the SteelSeries Engine 3 software. Even better, it had no accuracy issues despite its small size. Normally listed for $49.99, you can get the Rival 3 now for half off, at $24.88.

Get the SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless Gaming Mouse for $24.88 (Save $25.11)

4. Up to 33% off: These Soundcore noise-canceling headphones

Noise-canceling headphones can improve your music-listening experience, but they can also be expensive. Fortunately, Amazon is offering some Soundcore headphones for nice price cuts today. You can get the Life Q30 Hybrid set for just $59.99—a discount of up to $30 from its highest list price of $89.99 (depending on color). Soundcore said the Life Q30 Hybrid features dual noise-detecting microphones built-in to filter out 95% of low-frequency ambient noise and "ultra-soft" faux leather surrounding memory foam padding for a comfortable feel. Soundcore's more recent model, the Life Q35 headphones, are also on sale for $39 off, ringing up at $90.99. The developer says the Q35 also has dual microphones and different modes for noise-canceling, along with clear and crisp audio quality for phone calls.

Save up to 33% on Soundcore by Anker Headphones

5. Less than $10: This tooth-whitening toothpaste

Brighten up your pearly whites with this Cali White organic toothpaste for $8. Usually priced at $19.99 and already marked down to $8.99, you can get a four-ounce tube for an extra $0.99 off when you use coupon code 11COKT1U at checkout. Cali White says the toothpaste is fluoride-free with coconut oil, peppermint oil and more natural elements.

Get the Cali White Activated Charcoal and Organic Toothpaste for $8 with coupon code 11COKT1U (Save $11.99)

6. 20% off: These sleep-friendly wireless earbuds

If you use relaxing sounds to help you get a good night's sleep, you want to check out the Bose Sleepbuds II. Normally listed for $249, these wireless earbuds designed to stay comfortably in place the whole night are now on sale for $199, thanks to a $50 price cut. When we tested the Sleepbuds II, we were impressed with how well the buds stayed put in our tester's ears overnight, and the battery life of around nine hours. While we wished we could access other forms of relaxing audio like sleep stories and guided meditations, users can find 39 white noise sounds through the Bose mobile app.

Get the Bose Sleepbuds II for $199 (Save $50)

7. Less than $30: These portable water filters

Outdoor explorers on your gift list will surely appreciate the LifeStraw Personal water filter in their stocking this year. Typically priced at $39.95, you can get a two-pack of this slim camping accessory for $25.98. LifeStraw claims the straw can eliminate 99.9999% of waterborne bacteria and 99.9% of waterborne protozoan parasites. Wherever your next outdoor adventure takes you, LifeStraw promises it can filter up to 1,000 gallons of contaminated water. 

Get the LifeStraw Personal Water Filter, 2-Pack for $25.98 (Save $13.97)

8. 35% off: One of our favorite 50-Inch TVs

Save money without sacrificing quality with the TCL 5-Series televisions, on sale in various sizes now. The 4K UHD smart TV with built-in Roku technology starts for as low as $449.99 in its 55-inch size, which normally runs shoppers $699.99. The 5-Series is our pick for the best TV under $500, having wowed us with its bright and more colorful picture quality that beat other affordable screens on the market. The built-in technology from Roku (the makers of our favorite streaming device) also creates a user interface that's incredibly easy to use.

Get the TCL 55-Inch 5-Series 4K UHD Dolby Vision QLED Roku Smart TV for $449.99 (Save $250)

9.  Save $60: This combination drill kit

Upgrade the essentials in your home workshop with this DeWalt 20-Volt Max cordless drill combo kit. Typically listed for $199, this set, which features a cordless drill and an impact driver with two battery packs, can be yours for $139. DeWalt says both tools have a lightweight design and can fit into tighter areas, with the drill having a comfortable ergonomic handle and the driver featuring an LED light ring at its front end to help users see. 

Get the DeWalt 20-Volt Max Cordless Drill Combo Kit for $139 (Save $60)

10. Less than $20: This water-filtering bottle

Take your water on the go and keep it fresh with the Brita stainless steel water bottle. Normally listed for $26.99, you can get the 20-ounce vessel in rose color for 40% off, for a final price of $16.15. Brita says the bottle is designed with a Brita filter that fits in the straw, giving you clean and healthy tasting water at all times. The bottle itself is designed with double-wall insulated stainless steel to keep it cold regardless of conditions.

Get the Brita 20-Ounce Stainless Steel Water Filter Bottle from $16.15 (Save $2 to $10.84)

Amazon deals you may have missed

1.  DeskCycle 2 Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser

Stay active even when you're stuck at work with the DeskCycle 2 bike pedal machine. Normally listed for $199, this under desk exerciser can be yours for $149 thanks to a $50 coupon you can check off at the product page. DeskCycle says its 2021 model uses "​​premium magnetic resistance" for smooth pedal motion and quiet sound output while running. The brand says the machine works best for those with desks as low as 27 inches and for people no taller than 5 feet 10 inches tall, and comes with a detachable 5-function LCD display so you can keep track of your progress while typing away.

Get the DeskCycle 2 Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser for $149 with coupon (Save $50)

2. Samsung 49-Inch Odyssey G9 Gaming Monitor

If you want to truly experience every aspect of your favorite video game, the Samsung Odyssey G9 gaming monitor can show you way more than your standard laptop screen. Typically priced at $1,399.99, this 49-inch QLED monitor is on sale for $999.99 courtesy of a $400 price cut. Samsung says the curved design of the monitor is meant to match the curve of the human eye, providing "maximum immersion and minimal eye strain." The QLED technology also promises outstanding picture quality and a more vivid color display during gameplay. 

Get the Samsung 49-Inch Odyssey G9 QLED 240Hz Gaming Monitor for $999.99 (Save $400)

3. Blue Yeti USB Microphone

Blue makes some of the best USB microphones we've ever tested—experience its quality for yourself with one of the brand's most popular models. The Blue Yeti is now on sale for $89.99, a $40 discount from its list price of $129.99. As one of our favorite USB microphones, the Blue Yeti offers clear and crisp audio that can be adjusted with its dedicated knobs for headphone volume and mic gain. We also praised the Yeti for offering "one of the most seamless" user experiences we've ever had with a wired computer mic. 

Get the Blue Yeti USB Microphone for $89.99 (Save $40)

4. Apple AirPods (2nd Generation)

Apple makes some of the most popular and recognizable headphones on the market, so much so that discounts on them can be hard to find. Fortunately, the second-generation AirPods are on sale at Amazon for $99.99—a 37% discount from its list price of $159. These standard AirPods have a lot in common with one of our favorite wireless earbuds, the AirPods Pro ($189.99), as both models feature the Apple H1 chip, Siri compatibility and more than 24 hours of battery life (with charging case). The AirPods are also easy to set up and pair with iPhones.

Get the Apple AirPods (Second Generation) for $99.99 (Save $59.01)

5. Fitbit Charge 5

If you're looking for help in tracking your exercise progress, we can think of no better device than the Fitbit Charge 5. Typically priced at $179.95, the slim fitness tracker is now available for $129.95 thanks to a $50 discount. The Charge 5 is the best fitness tracker we've ever tested for many reasons, one of them being its compact size meant for maximum comfort, but a large enough screen to display and swipe through all the data. The Charge 5 includes 24/7 heart rate monitoring, summarized sleep data, exercise statistics and stress tracking all on the device without the need for a separate mobile app.

Get the Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker for $129.95 (Save $50)
